title: 7 Ways to Get More Credits on Audible

steps.title: Go to https://www.audible.com and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://www.audible.com and log in. You can use a web browser on your phone or a desktop computer. Click Sign In in the upper-right corner and log in to your account. If your subscription to Audible Premium Plus has been active for 30 days and you have one credit or less, you buy more. If you have two or more credits, you'll need to use them up before you can get more. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click or tap the number of credits.
steps.content: Click or tap the number of credits. You should see where it says the number of credits in the upper-right corner next to the magnifying glass. You'll then see a drop-down menu with the option to buy 3 more credits.

steps.title: Click or tap Buy 3 extra credits.
steps.content: Click or tap Buy 3 extra credits . You can only buy 3 credits in a bundle. Audible does not have an option to buy extra credits individually.

steps.title: Click or tap Buy Now.
steps.content: Click or tap Buy Now . It's below the bundle price. Currently, a bundle of 3 credits costs about $35.88, or about $12 per credit.

steps.title: Choose a payment method and select Confirm Purchase.
steps.content: Choose a payment method and select Confirm Purchase . This purchases your extra credits. You can now use your credits to buy audiobooks in the Audible app.

steps.title: Audible sometimes offers credits in exchange for completing challenges.
steps.content: Audible sometimes offers credits in exchange for completing challenges. The challenges vary, but generally, all result in free Audible credits. To learn about current Audible challenges, visit https://www.audible.com/ep/audible-challenge . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Sign up for a free 30-day trial of Audible Premium Plus.
steps.content: Sign up for a free 30-day trial of Audible Premium Plus. When you sign up for a free trial of Audible Premium Plus, you get 2 free credits. You can use these credits to get two free audiobooks . You can cancel your subscription at any time.

steps.title: An Audible Premium Plus subscription gives you a free credit each month.
steps.content: An Audible Premium Plus subscription gives you a free credit each month. A subscription to Audible Premium Plus costs $14.95 a month or $149.50 annually. There is also a 2-credit-per-month tier that costs $22.95 per month, or $229.50 annually. A subscription to Audible Premium Plus also includes unlimited access to Audible Originals, a selection of free audiobooks, sleep tracks, meditation programs, and podcasts. You can get access to all of these for $7.95 per month.

steps.title: Audible often offers special promotions.
steps.content: Audible often offers special promotions. You can use these deals to get free or discounted credits and audiobooks, including 2-for-1 deals. To see which promotions are available, visit https://www.audible.com/ep/audiobook-deals .

steps.title: Return a book you don't like for a credit.
steps.content: Return a book you don't like for a credit. If you don't like a book, you can exchange it for a free credit. However, Audible may impose limits on this. For example, if you listen to too much of an audiobook or exchange too many books in a row, your request may be denied. [3] X Research source

steps.title: You can get credits as a gift.
steps.content: You can get credits as a gift. You can receive credits by being gifted a membership to Audible Premium Plus. If you are already a member, you will receive all the credits you would have received from the membership plan all at once. If someone gifts you an audiobook you already own, you will receive a credit instead of the book. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Audible customer service can give complimentary credits.
steps.content: Audible customer service can give complimentary credits. If you report a problem with your Audible service, they may give you a complimentary credit to compensate you. If you threaten to quit your Premium Plus subscription, they may offer you a free credit to keep you on board. While not guaranteed, some Audible subscribers have received credits this way.
